description.en: Gmail is a free email service developed by Google. Users can access Gmail on the web and using third-party programs that synchronize email content through POP or IMAP protocols. Gmail started as a limited beta release on April 1, 2004 and ended its testing phase on July 7, 2009.
description.zh_CN: Gmail是Google开发的免费电子邮件服务。
description.nl: Gmail is een gratis e-mailservice van Google. Gebruikers hebben toegang tot Gmail via beveiligde webmail of via het POP3- of IMAP4-protocol.
